# WARNING: Do NOT modify this file manually!

# This file is code-generated and any manual changes will be overwritten.
#
# Generated by src/religion_codegen.py
################################################################################
title_decisions = {
	secretly_convert_to_catholic_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = catholic }
			NOT = { religion = catholic }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			catholic = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = catholic } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = catholic
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = catholic
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = catholic
			}
		}
	}

			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_paulician_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = paulician }
			NOT = { religion = paulician }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			paulician = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = paulician } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = paulician
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = paulician
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = paulician
			}
		}
	}

	}
	secretly_convert_to_druze_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = druze }
			NOT = { religion = druze }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			druze = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = druze } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = druze
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = druze
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = druze
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_qarmatian_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = qarmatian }
			NOT = { religion = qarmatian }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			qarmatian = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = qarmatian } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = qarmatian
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = qarmatian
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = qarmatian
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_norse_pagan_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = norse_pagan }
			NOT = { religion = norse_pagan }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			norse_pagan = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = norse_pagan } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = norse_pagan
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = norse_pagan
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = norse_pagan
			}
		}
	}

			}

				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }

			}

	secretly_convert_to_aztec_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = aztec }
			NOT = { religion = aztec }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			aztec = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
				OR = {
					has_global_flag = aztec_arrival
					religions_are_standard_trigger = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = aztec } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = aztec
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = aztec
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = aztec
			}
		}
	}

		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = zurvanist }

					is_heretic = no

			}

		ai = no

		from_potential = {

			NOT = { secret_religion = manichean }
			NOT = { religion = manichean }

			manichean = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {

						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = manichean } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = manichean
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = manichean
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = manichean
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_mandaean_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = mandaean }
			NOT = { religion = mandaean }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			mandaean = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = mandaean } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = mandaean
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = mandaean
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = mandaean
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_yazidi_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no

					is_heretic = no
				}
			}

					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = yazidi } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = yazidi

			}

				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = yazidi
			}
		}

			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_jewish_holy_site = {

				set_secret_religion = karaite
			}
		}

	secretly_convert_to_hindu_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = hindu }
			NOT = { religion = hindu }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			hindu = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}

			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM

	secretly_convert_to_buddhist_holy_site = {
		filter = owned

		ai = no

		from_potential = {

					is_heretic = no

			}

			lower_tier_than = DUKE

				is_holy_site = buddhist

			}

			}

				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = buddhist
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_jain_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = jain }
			NOT = { religion = jain }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			jain = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = jain } }

				is_holy_site = jain

					is_holy_site = jain

			}

				}

			}

			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = jain
			}
		}
	}
	secretly_convert_to_taoist_holy_site = {
		filter = owned
		ai_target_filter = self
		ai = no

		from_potential = {
			is_incapable = no
			NOT = { secret_religion = taoist }
			NOT = { religion = taoist }
			NOT = { controls_religion = yes }
			taoist = {
				persistent_event_target:emf_religion_dummy_character = {
					is_heretic = no
				}
			}
		}
		potential = {
			lower_tier_than = DUKE
			owner = {
				OR = {
					character = FROM
					AND = {
						ROOT = { tier = BARON }
						vassal_of = FROM
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { location = { religion = taoist } }
			OR = {
				is_holy_site = taoist
				any_de_jure_vassal_title = {
					is_holy_site = taoist
				}
			}
		}
		allow = {
			FROM = {
				custom_tooltip = {
					text = NEEDS_250_PIETY_COST
					hidden_tooltip = { piety = 250 }
				}
				prisoner = no
				is_incapable = no
				NOT = { is_inaccessible_trigger = yes }
				NOT = { society_member_of = secret_religious_cult }
			}
		}
		effect = {
			FROM = {
				piety = -250
				set_secret_religion = taoist
			}
		}
	}
}
